sen.j: JR藤森駅（じぇいあーるふじのもりえき）は、京都府京都市伏見区深草大亀谷大山町99番地にある、西日本旅客鉄道（JR西日本）奈良線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located at Fukakusa Okamedani Oyama-cho 99, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, JR-Fujinomori Station is a stop on Nara Line which is operated by West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

JR-Fujinomori Station, located at Fukakusa Okamedani Oyama-cho 99, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Nara Line, which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

JR-Fujinomori Station, located at Fukakusa Okamedani Oyama-cho 99, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Nara Line, which is operated by the West Japan Railway Company (JR West).

sen.j: JRの特定都区市内制度における「京都市内」の駅である。
sen.e: It is a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.
sen.cmt: ①「特定都区市内制度」の定訳は不明ですが、「通信用語の基礎知識」のホームページによれば「JRの旅客営業における、特定の都区市内に適用される料金制度」のことです。 ②これを参考に付けた英訳が"railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas"で、同じ表現がアメリカの学術論文に存在するようです(ただし該当箇所を発見することはできませんでした）。
sen.e: It's a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.
It's a stop in Kyoto City, where the JR railway fare system of specific metropolitan and urban areas is applied.

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Structure of the station
The station's structure
Station layout
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線プラットホームを持つ地上駅で、掘り割り型の橋上駅舎である。
sen.e: JR-Fujinomori Station has two separate platforms, two boarding areas and the station buiding centering its functions in its second floor, and the station building & the track both sit on the site created by digging the ground, and the platforms can be seen from the ground level of outside the station.
sen.cmt: ①「相対式２面２線プラットホーム」とは、「相対式プラットホーム２つと、２つの乗り場」の意味であり（Wiki 「プラットホーム」参照）、「プラットホーム」と「乗り場」を訳し分ける必要があることから前者を"platform"後者を"boarding area"としています。 ②「地上駅（広義）」とは「地上からプラットホームが目視できる駅」のこと（Wiki 「地上駅」参照）で、それを左では訳出したつもりです。 ③「掘り割り型」とは「地面を掘り、元の地盤より低い位置に駅舎等を作る方式」のこと[http://www.ktr.mlit.go.jp/gaikan/oyakudachi/yougo/keyword_01.html#6]であり、それを左では訳出したつもりです。 ④「橋上駅舎」とは「（改札口や乗車券売り場といった）その機能を２階部分に集約した駅舎」のこと（Wiki 「橋上駅」参照）で、それを左では訳出したつもりです。
sen.e: JR-Fujinomori Station has two separate platforms and two boarding areas; the station building's functional center is on the second floor, and the station building and the track sit on the site created by digging out the ground, so the platforms can be seen from the ground level from outside the station.

JR-Fujinomori Station has two separate platforms and two tracks; the station building's functional center is on the second floor, and the station building and the track sit on the site created by digging out the ground, so the platforms can be seen from the ground level from outside the station.

sen.j: なお駅業務は（株）ジェイアール西日本交通サービスへ委託されている。
sen.e: In addition, the operation of the station is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.
Additionally, the operation of the station is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.
Additionally, the operation of the station is consigned to JR West Kotsu Service.

sen.j: ICOCA・Jスルー利用可能駅。
sen.e: ICOCA and J-Tthrough Card, both passengers' IC cards, are available for payment of railway fares at this station.
ICOCA and J-Through Card, both of which are passenger IC cards, are available for payment of railway fares at this station.
ICOCA and J-Through Card, both of which are passenger IC cards, are available for payment of railway fares at this station.

sen.j: ICOCAの相互利用対象であるPiTaPa（スルッとKANSAI協議会）も利用可能。
sen.e: PiTaPa Card is also available, which is compatible with ICOCA and is issued by Surutto Kansai Association.
PiTaPa Card is also available, which is compatible with ICOCA and is issued by Surutto Kansai Association.
PiTaPa Card is also available, which is compatible with ICOCA and is issued by Surutto Kansai Association.

sen.j: 京都から来た列車はこの駅から単線区間に入る。
sen.e: The train coming down from Kyoto Station runs on a single track from JR-Fujinomori Station and southward.
The train coming down from Kyoto Station runs on a single track from JR-Fujinomori Station toward the south.
The train coming down from Kyoto Station runs on a single track from JR-Fujinomori Station toward the south.

Passenger usage statistics
Passenger use
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 2006年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約2,701人である。
sen.e: In fiscal 2006, the number of passengers was about 2701 a day.
The number of daily passengers was about 2,701 in fiscal 2006.
The number of daily passengers was about 2,701 in fiscal 2006.

sen.j: （京都府統計書より）
sen.e: (according to the statistics of Kyoto Prefecture)
(These statistics are according to Kyoto Prefecture.)
(According to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report)

sen.e: Surroundings of the station
The station's surroundings
Station surroundings
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 京都教育大学 - 元々は「京都教育大学前」の駅名を名乗る計画もあった。
sen.e: Kyoto University of Education - Originally, there was a plan to call the station as "Kyoto Kyoiku Daigaku-mae (the front of Kyoto University of Education)."
Kyoto University of Education - Originally, there was a plan to call the station "Kyoto Kyoiku Daigaku-mae (the front of Kyoto University of Education)."
Kyoto University of Education - Originally, there was a plan to call the station 'Kyoto Kyoiku Daigaku-mae (the front of Kyoto University of Education).'

sen.e: Fujinomori-jinja Shrine

sen.j: 京都深草大亀谷郵便局

sen.j: 墨染通
sen.e: Sumizome-dori Street
Sumizome-dori Street
Sumizome-dori Street

sen.j: JR藤森という駅名を名乗ってはいるが、京阪本線の藤森駅とは離れており、むしろ墨染駅の方が近い。
sen.e: Though the stop is named "JR-Fujinomori Station," Sumizome Station on Keihan Main Line (KML) is located nearer to it than Fujinomori Station on KML.
Though the stop is called "JR-Fujinomori Station," Sumizome Station on the Keihan Main Line (KML) is located nearer to it than Fujinomori Station on the KML.
Although the stop is called "JR-Fujinomori Station," Sumizome Station on the Keihan Main Line (KML) is located nearer to it than Fujinomori Station on the KML.

sen.j: ただし住所表記としての、京都市伏見区深草藤森町（京都教育大学の所在地）からは最も近い位置にある。
sen.e: Nevertheless, "JR-Fujinomori Station" is the nearest stop from the address of Fukakusa Fujinomori-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City (the location of Kyoto University of Education).
Nevertheless, "JR-Fujinomori Station" is the nearest stop from the address of Fukakusa Fujinomori-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City (where the Kyoto University of Education is located).
Nevertheless, "JR-Fujinomori Station" is the nearest stop from the address of Fukakusa Fujinomori-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City (where the Kyoto University of Education is located).

sen.j: 連絡バス路線
sen.e: Connected bus services
Connected bus services
Connected bus services

sen.j: 京都市営バス 臨南5系統 竹田駅 (京都府)～藤森神社～竹田駅循環 2006年4月1日の経路変更で、同駅前にも立ち寄りを行うようになった。
sen.e: Kyoto City Bus Route Rinnan 5--Takeda Station (in Kyoto Prefecture) ～Fujinomori-jinja Shrine～Takeda Station--On April 1, 2006, the route of the bus service was changed to make a stop at Takeda Station.

Kyoto City Bus Route Rinnan 5 - Takeda Station (in Kyoto Prefecture) ～ Fujinomori-jinja Shrine ～ Takeda Station - On April 1, 2006, the route of the bus service was changed in order to make a stop at Takeda Station.

Kyoto City Bus Route Rinnan 5: Takeda Station (Kyoto Prefecture) - Fujinomori-jinja Shrine - Takeda Station; On April 1, 2006, the route of the bus service was changed in order to make a stop at Takeda Station.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1997年（平成9年）3月8日 当時、奈良線内で駅間が一番長かった稲荷駅～桃山駅間に開業。
sen.e: March 8, 1997--JR-Fujinomori Station began its operation in between the section from Inari Station to Momoyama Station, which had been the longest section without a stop on Nara Line until this date.

March 8, 1997 - JR-Fujinomori Station began its operation in between the section from Inari Station to Momoyama Station, which had to that point been the longest section without a stop on the Nara Line.

March 8, 1997: JR-Fujinomori Station began its operation in between the section from Inari Station to Momoyama Station, which had to that point been the longest section without a stop on the Nara Line.

sen.j: 駅名の由来
sen.e: Origin of the station name
Origin of the station's name
Origin of the station's name

sen.j: JRを附するのは京阪本線の藤森駅と区別するため。
sen.e: "JR" is attached at the head to distinguish itself from Fujinomori Station on Keihan Main Line.
"JR" is used at the head to distinguish this station from Fujinomori Station on the Keihan Main Line.
"JR" is used at the head to distinguish this station from Fujinomori Station on the Keihan Main Line.

sen.j: "JR"を冠する駅名表記はJR西日本独自のもので、ほかのJR各社には見られない。
sen.e: The "JR" attachment style is the peculiar one to JR West, and it is never seen in the other JR companies.
The "JR" prefix is characteristic of JR West, so it is never seen in the other JR companies.
The "JR" prefix is characteristic of JR West, so it is never seen in the other JR companies.
